name: BallKicker
description:
The most difficult endless runner game! Ball Kicker is the first of its kind to combine endless levels with a twist in this soccer-style retro casual game! It challenges you to keep the ball with you while jumping between platforms as you run to compete against the best around the world!
Challenge your friends, make rivals, unlock achievements and be the best at this innovative challenge. Unlock 8 Levels of insane pixel art action! Whatever you do... "Don't drop the ball"
